tool_description: A collection of hadiths API in one place, Sahih Bukhari, Sahih muslim, Ibn majah, Abu Dawud. working on compiling timidhi and nezai insha Allah.
title: Hadiths API

api_list.name: Get collection by id
api_list.description: Each collection have a unique ID. These ID can be used to get the collection
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/collections/639caf9a9ba6cf29e8b8c221"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get categories by collection
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/categories?collection=Sahih%20Bukhari"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all categories
api_list.description: Get all categories from the database, by default limit is 10 and page is 1. the limit and page can be altered to suit your taste.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

categories.Chapter_English: Rubbing hands and feet with dust (Tayammum)
Virtues of Prayer at Masjid Makkah and Madinah
Pilgrims Prevented from Completing the Pilgrimage
Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage
Virtues of the Night of Qadr
Retiring to a Mosque for Remembrance of Allah (I'tikaf)
Sales in which a Price is paid for Goods to be Delivered Later (As-Salam)
Transferance of a Debt from One Person to Another (Al-Hawaala)
Loans, Payment of Loans, Freezing of Property, Bankruptcy
Lost Things Picked up by Someone (Luqatah)
Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)
One-fifth of Booty to the Cause of Allah (Khumus)
Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions
Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)
Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)
Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))
Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)
Afflictions and the End of the World
Accepting Information Given by a Truthful Person
Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah
The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer
The Book of Prayer - Two Eids
The Book of the Rules of Inheritance
The Book of Oaths, Muharibin, Qasas (Retaliation), and Diyat (Blood Money)
The Book of Jihad and Expeditions
The Book of Hunting, Slaughter, and what may be Eaten
The Book of Clothes and Adornment
The Book of Manners and Etiquette
The Book Concerning the Use of Correct Words
The Book of the Merits of the Companions
The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship
The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness
Characteristics of The Hypocrites And Rulings Concerning Them
Characteristics of the Day of Judgment, Paradise, and Hell
The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants
The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour
The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts
The Book of Commentary on the Qur'an
The Book Of The Prayer For Rain (Kitab al-Istisqa')
Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Rules of Law about the Prayer during Journey
Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Ramadan
Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Prostration while reciting the Qur'an
Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr
The Book of Lost and Found Items
The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)
Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)
Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)
The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)
Divination and Omens (Kitab Al-Kahanah Wa Al-Tatayyur)
The Book of Manumission of Slaves
Dialects and Readings of the Qur'an (Kitab Al-Huruf Wa Al-Qira'at)
Trials and Fierce Battles (Kitab Al-Fitan Wa Al-Malahim)
Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)
The Book of Purification and its Sunnah
The Book of the Adhan and the Sunnah Regarding It
The Book On The Mosques And The Congregations
Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

api_list.name: Get all collections
api_list.description: Get all collections from the database, by default limit is 10 and page is 1. the limit and page can be altered to suit your taste.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/collections"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search for hadiths  with key words
api_list.description:
Searching for hadiths. Just enter the keyword, example searching for food, the request will look like this https://hadiths-api.vercel.app/api/hadiths?search=food

And limit can be added to reduce the amount of data received, by default the limit is 10.
Page number by default is page1, but it can be changed as you want.
NB: The %20 in the example query is just an empty space as the name of the collection is Sahih Bukhari in the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/hadiths?search=food"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

hadith.Section_English: How the Divine Revelation started being revealed to Allah's Messenger
hadith.Section_Arabic: كَيْفَ كَانَ بَدْءُ الْوَحْىِ إِلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
hadith.English_Hadith: Narrated 'Umar bin Al-Khattab: I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, "The reward of deeds depends upon theintentions and every person will get the reward according to what hehas intended. So whoever emigrated for worldly benefits or for a womanto marry, his emigration was for what he emigrated for."
hadith.English_Matn: I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, "The reward of deeds depends upon theintentions and every person will get the reward according to what hehas intended. So whoever emigrated for worldly benefits or for a womanto marry, his emigration was for what he emigrated for."
hadith.Arabic_Hadith: حَدَّثَنَا الْحُمَيْدِيُّ عَبْدُاللَّهِ بْنُ الزُّبَيْرِ، قَالَ حَدَّثَنَا سُفْيَانُ، قَالَ حَدَّثَنَا يَحْيَى بْنُ سَعِيدٍ الأَنْصَارِيُّ، قَالَ أَخْبَرَنِي مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ التَّيْمِيُّ، أَنَّهُ سَمِعَ عَلْقَمَةَ بْنَ وَقَّاصٍ اللَّيْثِيَّ، يَقُولُ سَمِعْتُ عُمَرَ بْنَ الْخَطَّابِ ـ رضى الله عنه ـ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ قَالَ سَمِعْتُ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَقُولُ ‏ ‏ إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى، فَمَنْ كَانَتْ هِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى دُنْيَا يُصِيبُهَا أَوْ إِلَى امْرَأَةٍ يَنْكِحُهَا فَهِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى مَا هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِ ‏
hadith.Arabic_Isnad: حَدَّثَنَا الْحُمَيْدِيُّ عَبْدُاللَّهِ بْنُ الزُّبَيْرِ، قَالَ حَدَّثَنَا سُفْيَانُ، قَالَ حَدَّثَنَا يَحْيَى بْنُ سَعِيدٍ الأَنْصَارِيُّ، قَالَ أَخْبَرَنِي مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ التَّيْمِيُّ، أَنَّهُ سَمِعَ عَلْقَمَةَ بْنَ وَقَّاصٍ اللَّيْثِيَّ، يَقُولُ سَمِعْتُ عُمَرَ بْنَ الْخَطَّابِ ـ رضى الله عنه ـ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ قَالَ
hadith.Arabic_Matn: سَمِعْتُ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَقُولُ ‏ ‏ إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى، فَمَنْ كَانَتْ هِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى دُنْيَا يُصِيبُهَا أَوْ إِلَى امْرَأَةٍ يَنْكِحُهَا فَهِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى مَا هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِ ‏

api_list.name: Get hadiths by collection
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/hadiths?collection=Sahih%20Bukhari"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get hadiths based on the category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/hadiths?collection=Sahih%20Bukhari&category=Revelation"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search for hadiths in collection with key words
api_list.description:
Searching for hadiths based on their various collections. Just enter the keyword, example searching for food, the request will look like this https://hadiths-api.vercel.app/api/hadiths?collection=Sahih Bukhari&search=food

And limit can be added to reduce the amount of data received, by default the limit is 10.
Page number by default is page1, but it can be changed as you want.
NB: The %20 in the example query is just an empty space as the name of the collection is Sahih Bukhari in the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/hadiths?collection=Sahih%20Bukhari&search=food"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all hadiths
api_list.description: Get all hadiths from the database, by default limit is 10 and page is 1. the limit and page can be altered to suit your taste.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com/hadiths"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadiths-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
